name: Sales Performance Report
description: Track and analyze sales performance metrics

nodes.name: Load Sales Data
nodes.description: Load sales transaction data from CSV source

output.description: Sales transaction data with columns: date, product, region, amount

nodes.name: Load Sales Targets
nodes.description: Load sales targets by region and quarter

output.description: Sales targets with columns: region, quarter, target_amount

nodes.name: Process Sales Data
nodes.description: Clean and aggregate sales data by region and month

output.description: Processed sales data aggregated by region and month

nodes.name: Calculate Performance Metrics
nodes.description: Calculate KPIs: total sales, growth rate, target achievement

output.description: Performance metrics: region, total_sales, target, achievement_rate

nodes.name: Visualize Sales Performance
nodes.description: Create interactive chart showing performance vs targets

output.description: Interactive bar chart comparing actual sales vs targets by region
